name: The Black Box Of Communism
description:
Made for the #uniginehackathon

LEVEL DESIGN BY CHIEF

MODELLING BY MADBEAR

You say it has a sense,
But you didn't find it
I don't know what to say
My impact is gone
The sky smog filled
You and I are not alone
Look at the hills in the distance
Blue lights are shine

Not a single living soul
Not a found on the star
Brain is humming like the tires
We not here, but everywhere
Waves cut the ocean
Just like a nuclear array
If you're lost now,
Then you understand my motive

MUSIC BY OSIN
